forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 58F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thunderstorms during the evening giving way to periods of light rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with thunderstorms, in the evening, then periods of rain later at night. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low near 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 60F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
